description:
This video creation course will teach you how to develop a targeted script and then create an effective video using videomaker FX

This course is targeted at people who understand the power of online video marketing and want to create effective videos but are not confident in how they start and need a structure to work with. Whilst many people confirm benefit of using videos in their online marketing is hard to find a comprehensive course that takes you from identifying your target customer to creating a powerful video script and subsequently developing the video.

Think like a master videomaker and develop a video aimed at your target customers

  • Understand who you are targeting and what problems concern them
  • Be certain about what you want to achieve
  • Learn a process to communicate with your target customers
  • Communicate in a way that turns your viewers into buyers

This course includes an entire section on how to develop videos in videomaker FX

  • Create a project
  • Understand the types of templates available
  • Select and organise slides
  • Add background and shapes
  • Insert and edit text
  • Add soundtrack or voice-over
  • Export your video


If you want to learn how to develop effective videos quickly then this is the course for you

Enrolled today and start to create your first video quickly
title: Video Marketing : Make Effective Videos Fast
